document_data.caption: A map of Huzuz showing the Street of the Ajami lined in black.
document_data.name: Street of the Ajami
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of the Ajami''', or '''Ajami Street''', was located in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Street of the Ajami was adjacent to the [[Caravan Boulevard]], branching off to head northwest to exit Huzuz near the [[Caliph's Harbor]] where it met the [[River Road]]. The Street of the Ajami formed much of the southwest boundary for the [[Craft District]], bisected the [[Warehouse District of Huzuz|Warehouse District]], and formed a small portion of the northeast borders of both the [[Central District]] and [[Pilgrims' District]]. The street also lined a portion of the [[Court District]] where it bulged up into the southern Craft District.
